tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transportation_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_location VARCHAR(255),
  end_location VARCHAR(255),
  distance_in_miles DECIMAL,
  delivery_schedule_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE DeliveryRoutes (
    route_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    from_location VARCHAR(100),
    to_location VARCHAR(100),
    distance DECIMAL,
    estimated_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE DeliverySchedule (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    driver_id INT,
    delivery_date DATE,
    delivery_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    origin VARCHAR,
    destination VARCHAR,
    distance INT,
    travel_time INT
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_routes (
  route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  starting_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  destination VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  distance_km FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE delivery_schedule (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id UUID REFERENCES transportation_routes(route_id),
  delivery_date DATE NOT NULL,
  delivery_time TIME NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE delivery_orders (
  order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id UUID REFERENCES transportation_routes(route_id),
  customer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  order_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE delivery_vehicles (
  vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  capacity_tons FLOAT NOT NULL,
  driver_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE driver_schedule (
  driver_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID REFERENCES delivery_vehicles(vehicle_id),
  schedule_id UUID REFERENCES delivery_schedule(schedule_id),
  driver_availability BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)
